reviews.review_header: the PERFECT ANTI-designer bag ladies and gents
reviews.review_text: I first saw this bag when I was shopping at Anthropologie and this lady was carrying it. I *had* to ask where she got it from, cuteness overload. She had worn it so hard there were holes underneath the handles. I have moments where I love having a cheap chicken purse ( I believe I purchased it for about 20 back before this purse exploded on here-- surprised they bumped it to $40... IDK if its worth that price personally), as opposed to a designer bag worth hundred of thousands of dollars-- and this purse makes people smile! This is def a novelty purse, the zipper on the top is kinda small ( the opening in general). Makes it hard to grab aroung in the bag, might be easier to have 2-3pouches in there with all your things in them. That way you could just pull a pouch out, instead of fishing in your bag with one hand.The lining inside is a pale yellow, gets dirty real fast--black would be perfect. Out of all the bags I have, some designer some not, this bag gets me the most compliments, even Nordstrom sales people love it, go figure!
Good quality and nice workmanship
Super cute!
felt very cheap

I love this purse so much. I had one exactly like it, but lost it in a nasty breakup. I finally found it again on Amazon, and it's just like I remembered it. It's rubbery, but fairly large on the inside. The zipper is short, so you can't jam a large wallet through the opening. I get so many compliments on it!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_header: Spreads the chicken cheer everywhere you go!
reviews.review_text: Got this last Christmas as an asked for gift. Yes, it's rubber so it smelled like .....rubber. The smell ( which smelled like new dolls used to smell to me when I got them as child ) was not bad at all, it has since faded. The opening is small, that is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, it's hard to get anything out of this purse. I took it out in public as soon as I got it ( even though my sister begged me not to take it ) and the compliments began right away. I have had so many compliments on this purse that I lost count long ago. Not very long into the day, my sister was holding my purse for me and even sat it on her side of the tabletop of the restaurant we lunched at. I am not really interested in carrying the same cookie cutter purse the rest of the world has and this purse has put smiles on so many faces ( yes, one or two of them have been mean ones ) that I really look forward to going places with it. This little purse is a conversation starter and just seems to make people happy seeing it. So, own the look and carry it proudly and just tell them where you got it when they try to buy it from you because I have had a lot of that too.

reviews.review_header: This thing is so incredibly stupid looking that I had to have it when I ...
reviews.review_text: This thing is so incredibly stupid looking that I had to have it when I saw it. It makes me super happy every time I see it, causes spontaneous conversation, and amusement to everyone else who sees it as well. I have two complaints, first the opening is too fricking small, which is incredibly frustrating, given that it's roomy and so much more should fit in it than does. Second, it would be more aesthetically pleasing if a small amount of material/foam/whatever were in the head so that my poor chicken doesn't look so smooshed. Lastly, a previous reviewer extolled the virtues of the spacious handles, easily accommodating over the shoulder wear, even in a bulky winter cloak. If you purchased as a fat person, expecting it to fit over your arm, alas, it may not. I am still ridiculously happy with my stupid handbag, regardless.

Purse is positively adorable! Looks exactly like the pictures and the detail is great! Lots of little feathers. Gave it a 4 because the zipper opening is small and there's no mini zipper pocket inside which would've been really helpful.

Ordered this as a "fun" bag as this is the Year of the Rooster 2017. It is large enough to hold a wallet, an umbrella, a pocket camera, a handphone, a fat toiletry pouch that holds all my "girl items". My only dislike is the length/size of the zip opening on top of the bag - it is 6 inches (15cm). To put a regular size ladies wallet or an umbrella inside the bag, I had to slip the item in sideways (not length-wise). I think it will be hard to have to maneuver an item to it's shorter side inside the bag just to take it out of the bag. And of course if you have "big" hands, it will be a struggle to get your hand even inside the bag. Even with my hands (XS Gloves American-Size), it was not easy for me. And the straps are not long enough to carry the bag on my shoulder.

reviews.review_header: Nice addition to a crowded marketplace.
reviews.review_text: The rubber chicken purse industry is known to be very brutal and cut-throat. I hear that folks who work in this business tend to suffer from some form of PTSD, and in some cases spend some time at mental health clinics. I guess I understand the stress since rubber chicken purses are always in such high demand. But is it going too far? In the end... Purchasing a rubber chicken purse is basically the same as buying conflict diamonds from Africa. The straps are nicely made.

reviews.review_header: Pecked off more than I could chew
reviews.review_text: This was a great investment until.....she got loose and one thing led to another, she ate all the food in my house, freaked out my goats, tormented the geese, got freaky with the rooster and now she's sitting on eggs, if they hatch I have no idea how to care for more rubber chicken purses in mini form, like, what do they even eat? What can I put inside of them? Do they need water? Quarters? DO THEY EVEN HATCH WITH HANDLES? Seriously. The one I got may be a rogue defect, she's got a mind of her own and I'm not sure I'm ready for this level of commitment. Cute though!

reviews.review_header: I use this as my daily purse.
reviews.review_text: I use this as my daily purse. It is a fantastic ice-breaker. Both children and adults seem to love it. Everyone gets a giggle out of seeing this big, obnoxious purse. Joking aside, its actually very sturdy and has held up well to daily use.
If you want a purse that looks like a chicken, this is the one to get. The build quality is great. The design looks high quality. Good amount of storage space inside, but only one large pocket.

reviews.review_text: I'm all about strange bags.. Lol this one is amazing, and the compliments I receive on it are endless - THE only thing I wish this purse had, was a wider opening/ zipper... It has a pretty big area for all your things, but if you have a larger wallet, or are trying to put anything wider than a 4-5" in this purse you're going to have to push it, or work it through. All in all great bag, do not regret this decision, and I love taking it with me out to bars or social events, everyone loves it.. Not as much as I do though :) I might be responsible for the influx of people that will inevitably be carrying around this bag, lol I've told everyone where to get it!

reviews.review_header: The Joke That Became a Cherished Keepsake
reviews.review_text: I saw a photo of this item on my Facebook news feed and thought it was crazy and funny. Then I posted it on my good friend's wall and got a reply of "That's Beautiful" , meant it in a sarcastic way I'm sure. Then for fun I searched on Amazon to see if this purse was offered and there it was! We live a quite a distance apart, occasionally, I like to send her some strange gift in the mail just to let her know I'm thinking of her. This item fit the bill and it was on sale for a good price. So I placed the order and waited. She received and messaged me "Are you kidding me?!" She then posted a photo of herself with the purse on Facebook, her friends, and even her mother, marveled and raved about the purse. Everyone was jealous! I purchased the purse as a joke, but I received an update today that the purse made a debut outing with my friend, I was so surprised, never thought she would use it. I'm sure she didn't think so either, but the novelty must have grew on her. She said 4 people commented on the purse and were very excited! The purse was well worth the money for the laughs that we got, but was even more worth it now that my friend is going to use it! I haven't seen the purse in person so I can't speak of the quality, dimensions, etc. but gift-wise, this is great!

reviews.review_header: The Best Purse For a True Character
reviews.review_text: Pretty much every good review on this is accurate. The color is more of a light cream with a tinge of yellow, not dark yellow. Has a flat bottom so it sits well. The inside is just an empty large cavern with one pocket that is open (decent for keys and chapstick). I agree with everyone else that the smell is a little strong the first moments you have it, but mine has so far died down a bit. The zipper is also a little on the short side, so if your items inside are jumbled it can be a little harder to find. When I received mine it was a tad flattened, but the purse will naturally puff out after being filled (I'd say a day before the face on mine wasn't flat). Straps are short of course, easiest to carry it on the crook of your arm or in your hand rather than on your shoulder. My straps have this tubing in it that sometimes pops out a little bit, I just push it back in. All in all, amazing purse. I have gotten so many compliments on it. I ended up changing my text noise to that of a chicken cluck just to pull the whole thing together!
A great success with the chicken-lover in my life. Cluck cluck!

Only complaints are: - it gets dirty easy and with all the crevices it gets a little difficult to clean. - slight plastic like odor -small opening -plastic tubing comes out of straps However, the pros far level out those cons. It is adorable, spacious, and the interior pocket is so useful. I hate to carry a purse but I love this thing. I am so happy I got it. People love it too. I get stopped everywhere. A steal for the cost.

reviews.review_text: Got this as a gift for my "sister" since she's rather chicken obsessed. She LOVED it. She carries it around everywhere with her! It didn't have any plasticy odors like some had reported, too.

*edit April 1, 2018* The purse doesn’t hold up well if used daily, I typically buy a new one every year as the rubber splits and gets dirty and the bottom Frey’s. UNTIL now. The price used to be $24.99 and now it’s $39.99. NO THANK YOU. Not worth that price, but def worth $24.99. Best. Purse. Ever. I'm an animal lover and this bag is the right amount of cute and kitsch. The Red really pops and the bag compliments every outfit from a dress, nice pants, to jeans. You will love bringing this purse with you everywhere as your buddy, and enjoying all the fun comments people will make! The bag itself holds a lot of items, it has a smaller inside pocket for your keys or chapstick, and the lighter fabric lining helps you find items much easier (which is helpful since the zipper really is pretty short, enough for you to stick your hand in and feel around.)

I just received it and have only used it once....but here was my experience. I live in Brooklyn, which is "ground zero for cool". My neighborhood in particular, is awesome but is not the coolest (it's being invaded by investment bankers who are not cool at all). :-) I thought for sure that at least 4 or 5 women would stop me on the street asking me where I got the bag. I walked 3 blocks with my lovely rubber chicken purse without a word or glance by anyone (granted, I was holding it close to my body and my coat was the same off-white/yellowish color)...until, that is, a woman whom I suspect spied the lovely chicken, laughed out loud. Now, I couldn't tell if it was a, "OMG, that's the BEST thing ever!" laugh or a, "OMG, what an incredibly ridiculous thing!" laugh. Thinking she was a non-cool banker, I ignored that reaction and continued my walk. I got coffee (no reaction) and then went to my favorite bead/jewelry store (no reaction). Finally, I was so disappointed that my favorite jewelry store employees (and co-jewelry designers!) hadn't said a word, that I blurted, "What do you think about my lovely rubber chicken purse?" The reaction? "I LOVE your chicken purse. Oh my God! That is the best!" Not only did the employees genuinely gush about how much they LOVED my purse, but so did the customers. (Apparently, the head employee had designed animal purses at fashion school...which were shot down.) They even asked, "Where did you get it??" I'm looking forward to "round 2" next weekend. P.S. Love. This. Bag

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: she loved it

It's a purse that's also a rubber chicken. What's not to love? Seriously, it's just the funniest darn thing ever and looking at it makes me smile. I also get comments...lots and lots of comments. Many, many women have asked me where I got it in the two months I've been carrying it. Some ask me to wait while they run and get a friend to look at it. I've had a lady just tentatively reach out a finger and poke it at church, without saying a word. LOL. In fact, I've also had a number of men comment on the awesomeness that is the chicken purse. Okay...Pro's: Roomy. Very roomy! You can fit a lot of stuff in this bag. It seems to be very well constructed. The materials are, obviously, easy to clean and if you squish it, it bounces right back. Finally - IT'S A FREAKING RUBBER CHICKEN PURSE! Con's: Yes, amazing chicken purse or not, there are a couple of cons. The single biggest one is the opening zipper is kind of small and because of that it's hard to find things in. You do a lot of feeling around for what you want. I wish the little pocket on the side had a zipper. It's kind of worthless without it. The handles aren't sewn shut so the rubber hose thing that makes them round tends to try to slide out; you see it right away and slide it back, but still. But in the end, I love her. Yes, she's a her. She's a chicken, not a rooster. All I need now is an egg-shaped wallet.
Love love this purse!

The main reason to buy a handbag shaped like a chicken is because it's a handbag shaped like a chicken. I don't feel it's very functional due to the really small opening in the top. I find it hard to get things in or out of it. My mom is going to use it for decoration rather than as a purse. I bought the rubber fish one for myself and it has the same problem. But who cares, it's a fun thing to have when you feel like being silly and don't need to get things in and out of your purse often. I think the quality is good and the chicken has a very condescending expression, which I appreciate :)
Love it!! Gets loads of comments and laughs. Wish the zipper was a bit longer.
Adorable purse that will get you noticed. Too bad the opening is so narrow however. But I bought it for fun, not function!
This hen rocks the coop. So cool!
What a lovely purse. Has lasted and my daughter loves it.
A gift and she loved it. This is her second one. Everyone wants one.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_header: Great fun. The one downside is that the top ...
reviews.review_text: I get soooo many compliments on this purse!! Great fun. The one downside is that the top zipper opening is pretty small so certain things that I would like to have in my purse (like a hardback book) won't fit. But it's sooo cute and fun!!

reviews.review_header: MY new FAVORITE bag ever made
reviews.review_text: MY new FAVORITE bag ever made. only problem, I see others said too, the top zipper is a bit small making it hard to get wallets ans checkbooks and things out of the top with any ease.
Have had a ton of fun with this bag.

reviews.review_header: so many people have commented that they love it, I'm amazed
reviews.review_text: so many people have commented that they love it, I'm amazed. I think it let's people know I'm into chickens and have a sense of humor towards life...it's a real conversation starter.
The opening is too small to put much in, but it is worth getting; way cute.
What can I say? I'm a chicken lover, so had to have this purse. It's quite roomy inside, but be warned that the zipper entry is only 6.25" long and there are no pockets or compartments.
Good size but the opening is too small. At least my hand fits there, not to carry something big. I bought it for somebody else.

I just received my chicken purse today and there's a two inch hole in the seams. I'm pretty unhappy about it. Not that I expect the highest quality from a chicken purse but I certainly didn't expect holes.
Love it
I love it!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_header: Everyone who sees this bag loves it. The zipper ...
reviews.review_text: Everyone who sees this bag loves it. The zipper hole is way to small and the inside pocket is in the way. But holds a lot, may take 20 mins to find ur keys in it
The opening could be better
excellant quailty heavy duty but ugly as hell. the red eyed chicken has a demon like look.
Love this bag. Call it my Poultry Purse. :)
it arrived on time in perfect condition. its super cute and can fit a whole lot of things

I love my chicken purse. I don't want everyone to have one because mine is very special. I live in a small, rural town and have caused quite a stir. The only thing I don't like about it is that the zipper opening is a bit small but I have solved that issue by putting my belongings in a small make-up bag. Lots of space for wallet, checkbook, camera, calendar, keys. It's fantastic. I love the whimsy of it all. If you have a whimsical bone in your body (or an ironic one) I suggest that you get this purse. (They also come in brown but online it looks less striking as a chicken. The details are not as clear.) This purse is excellent psychotherapy because I laugh every time I see it, I HAVE to laugh and put things in perspective.
I love this purse! Everywhere I go people comment on this bag cause it's so darned cute. The only drawback is that the opening at the top is rather small.
love it

reviews.review_header: Perfect bag for a chicken person!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this thing. I am crazy about chickens anyways, but this is just the perfect thing ever. I wish the zipper was a tad bit longer, sometimes it's hard to get a woman's wallet out, but that's the only downfall. It's very durable, easy to clean and attracts a lot of questions! Great for the chicken lover!

reviews.review_header: Fun and totally usable as an every day bag
reviews.review_text: The outside dimensions are about the size of a small bowling ball. The outside is a rubbery substance but the lining and bottom is some kind of thin waterproof cloth. There is one small interior pocket to separate out some small items like a wallet or keys. Overall the bag is robust enough for everyday use. It seems to make people happy to see it and attracts many comments. The size of the zip is as shown in the picture and is big enough to accommodate a paperback book or similar sized objects. I do not find it to be a problem.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_header: I found it to be very cute, but the ...
reviews.review_text: I found it to be very cute, but the zipper is to small to get things in and out of the bag..
very small opening
zipper too small

The Rubber Chicken Hen Tote Bag was a gift for my daughter who is a backyard chicken tender! She LOVED the gift, one of those no special occasion except to say, "I love you"...She later posted a photo of the bag on Facebook! A fun and practical item!
I love it. I read other comments about this purse and the only con is the zipper is a little small, but I don't care. It's a blast o carry and makes me smile every time someone asks about it!
love it!
Cute novelty bag!

reviews.review_header: Your chicken fan will get lots of chuckles with this lovable, cluckable, clutch...er...handbag
reviews.review_text: This handbag is a fun little accessory and conversation starter. My wife got her present this morning and took it to work with her. She got so many comments that now I am worried I'll have to handcuff it to her because people love it so much. Great gift for the chicken-loving lady in your life.
Awesome for any chicken lover. Bought mine to use for "chicken emergency" bag, stocked with supplies in case of dreaded chicken injury.
Smells funky but looks fantastic!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: Bigger than it looks.... :) Super cute to boot

Bought this as a gift for a chicken-loving friend. The purse is roomy. The handle was a bit bent out of shape upon arrival but it was easy to mold back into place. It looked better than I expected so I was pleased. My friend got a kick out of itm
Good products and nice looking

I love this bag so much! One of the cutest purses I've ever bought. At first it was a little lumpy from being in a little box, but after shoving all of my junk into it, my chicken shaped up nicely. I've had it for a month and I'm still in love with it. There is a PVC plastic smell to the bag but DUH its brand new!!! It's not overpowering or gross in any way. It doesn't stink up your stuff either. If you don't want to smell it, don't stick your face inside of your bag. The zipper is quite short but I don't have any problems putting my stuff inside. I can get DVDs, CDs, my tablet, folded clothes, and my long wallet through the zipper so absolutely NO COMPLAINTS!!! You must buy this bag!

Loved the purse...so cute! But, it's so flat, thought there was something to blow it up, I saw a video and she just blow it up??????? was the video wrong??? It would take alot to fill the purse with your stuff to make it round.
Loved it!
Cute. But the zipper is so small it makes the bag unuseable.
Sooooo super cute! Very durable. Has a slightly smaller zipper/opening than I like but overall a cool find!

I really like it, people have gotten a kick out of seeing me carry a chicken purse, but oh have mercy. That tiny opening. If they could just make the opening bigger, I know people would really appreciate it. Maybe not right across the top, but perhaps down on the side a little bit.

as other people mentioned, this little bag does not smell as I would normally expect. It is really cute, but not getting the use as I had planned. I did read another's review that the opening was small; figured I could get around it. Can't. I have a hard time getting my wallet in and out so haven't really used it much. Turns out my girlfriend also has one and she uses it as a knitting bag.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I watched this for months & finally caught on sale. Had already read several reviews, so there were no surprises for me here. The opening is really small-could use a longer zipper, but I was aware before purchases. I use this for a handbag sometimes & sometimes pack my lunch in it (when I'm not carrying too big an apple!). I get lots of comments. Had a stranger approach & asked to take a picture of the bag for his mom to see if she wanted one. This item is lots of fun!
Super cute! The zipper opening is smaller than I thought. But over all a great piece for my chicken loving mom!
My grand daughter loved it. I got one for Christmas and she has wanted it since she saw mine. Very happy.

Bought this for my niece's 6th birthday. She's crazy for chickens & this bag was a stand-out hit. It's well made, has great details & provided all the adults with a laugh. As other reviewers have pointed out, the zip opening is quite small.
It was a thinner, cheaper material then I thought it would be, even though my sister loved the gift, it didn't seem like it would hold up very long at all.
Best every. I use it randomly and it takes people a minute to figure out what it is. Love it!!!

It's fun, quality is what you would expect, mild plasticky smell. I bought it because the description says, "Origin: ITALY", so I thought it would be a bargain. The bag is stamped MADE IN CHINA. That brings to mind quality issues (lead in paint, toxic plastics, etc), and the fact that in China, this probably cost $1. Maybe my expectations were too high?
This bag is very well made, does not have that peculiar rubbery smell that some products do and attracts a lot of positive, attention and smiles.
Item was very cute! Much nicer quality than I expected; gave it to my aunt for her birthday and she LOVED it!

I purchased this for my mother for mother's day. She absolutely loves it. My mom is very fun and social, so when she gets in a fun and funky mood, I can definitely see her wearing this purse out about town. She laughed out load when she opened her chicken purse gift. She loves things that make her smile and giggle (who doesn't), so this was a perfect, fun gift for her. The zipper opening on top is small, as others have said, but not so small that you can't put belongings in. The purse cavern is large and can hold quite a bit, I imagine. The small opening could be annoying, but not to the point of not wearing the purse. It's still a 5 star item for sure.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: iT WAS VERY NICE. I bought it for my granddaughter for Easter. We thought it was much larger than we expected.

reviews.review_header: I can't go back to a regular purse! So addictive to carry!
reviews.review_text: This is perhaps the best purse I have ever owned! I recommend it for anyone who has a sense of humor or wants to draw a little attention while out in public. But be prepared for chuckles and people constantly asking you were you got it from. My chicken purse who I have named Ms. Nugget goes everywhere with me and I find it difficult now to go back to a regular purse. I was surprised that the purse is actually a little bit bigger then I expected. As stated before by other people the zipper is a little too small and sometimes you have to work to get things in or out. But that is the only complaint I could find with this purse. It is made of rubber but I did not notice any kind of rubber smell. Because it is made of rubber I would not put anything sharp in it. I like the fact that it is made from rubber because I have been caught in many rainstorms this spring and the rain drops just bounce right off it. The inside is made from a silky type material and it has one pocket which is handy. The red handles are comfortable and are made from some kind of sturdy wire. The purse over all is deep and can fit many things. It is also easy to wipe clean. I have to say I am very addicted to this purse and carry it where ever I go.

Excellent - its the 2nd time I've bought this purse for my daughter - once was about 10 years ago - she loves it and gets tons of compliments on it. It arrived in 2 days!!!! Only drawback is the small open at the top of the bag - but I understand why it might need to be.

I bought this bag to carry to work on April 1st and also to use on Easter. It got lots of smiles. I wish the handles were just a little bit longer, it's tough to carry over my shoulder. Also, the zipper on top is too small, makes it difficult to reach in and out to retrieve keys, tissues, etc. But all in all it served the purpose - to elicit a smile or two from my friends.

reviews.review_header: Rubber Chicken Hen Tote Handbag purse "Henbag"
reviews.review_text: Hello, The Rubber Chicken Hen Tote Bag is cute. And ordered. I was very dissatisfied because there were reddish color blotches all over yellow chicken. I believe red color dye ran from the handle when not dry. ?? I have the chicken here and the box if you want it returned. I was told that I had a refund and hope so. Love the chicken but not blotchy with color. Thanks for trying ! Happy with other items. Nancy Schoettler

reviews.review_header: Great gift for someone who like offbeat items
reviews.review_text: I got this purse as a Valentine's day present for my girlfriend. She loves it! A nice gift for someone who likes chickens or offbeat items. The only issue is the zipper opening is a little small.

Seriously. The best. I carry her everywhere and everyone loves her. She's essentially famous now. There's a pocket on the inside, which is a nice surprise. The zipper is smaller, which I knew going in, but fits my checkbook wallet fine. Light can pass through the rubber bag, which is great because it helps counter the slight difficulty of finding stuff through the small opening. LOVE.
Another cute selection! Have had many comments on it, and is very comfortable to carry. A real conversation piece for sure.
This is a cute purse. It's a conversation piece and gets attention. Not the best quality. Zipper hole on top is small. Quick delivery with this vendor.

I love when i get complements from men "i like your purse!" which i response to "I bet you don't say that often". Kids love it too. i just thought it went with my last name "Gallegos", "Gallo" Spanish for Rooster.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how quirky and unique this handbag is. I get people stopping me all the time to ask where I got this bag. It's definitely a conversation starter.

reviews.review_header: A great gift for someone that raises chickens!
reviews.review_text: My friend LOVED IT! She has five designer chickens...so this was perfect for her. A wonderful spoof gift. she actually used it..
it came fast, and just looks even better in person then on screen! I love it and cant wait to use it. Just too awesome
my wife loved it!!! why do i have to say more when i do not want to? bite me again!!!!!!!!

A friend had seen this and wanted one so I got it for her. It's well made and has very minor odor (rubber smell). I don't know what size hands those people who complained had, but it was large enough for both of us and she got her large billfold in with no problem. It's a novelty item, but really cute. We decided she needed a name, so the bag is now Clarissa Clucker. The detailing on the rubber is cute and the handles appear sturdy. So for now, unless it falls apart (we just got it), it's a five on the fun scale!
My friend raises chickens and is called the chicken lady. This is a gift for her. She will be totally delighted.

I just love unique and quirky products and i get a laugh from many a person about my beautiful handbag and as i have and love my chickens i am known as the mad chicken lady. thanks so much for the easy way to purchase this product. I would be very interested in other chicken products if anyone wants to email me. thank you.

I call her count bessie, a lot of people complained about the zipper personally for me it works fine, It doesn't have a funky smell either, frankly what threw me for a loop was demon red eyes, other than it's a nice big purse.

reviews.review_header: Now who doesn't need a rubber chicken purse?
reviews.review_text: she has no pockets and her zipper opening isn't too wide, but I guarantee you she will be a real conversation starter..
doesn't look like anything of the picture...too small for adult. Will have to send back and buy another present for mother.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: Everywhere I go carrying this purse people say "I love your bag!" I say "It's my rubber chicken purse" LOL
The rubber chicken purse is so much fun and a sure fire attention getter. I love my chicken and he loves me!!

reviews.review_header: For the quirky hen lover in your life!
reviews.review_text: This made my friend's day when I surprised her for her birthday. She has pet hens in her yard who just happen to lay eggs, too. Are you bold enough to rock a hen bag? If so, this is the quirky purse for you!

I've been put under a love spell by our chickens, and was lead by their chicken voodoo to buy this purse. Now little ol' ladies everywhere feel the awesome need to vocalize their approval of my zany chicken purse. It is well made and has plenty of room inside for everything a gal needs while on the go.

This is just what I was looking for! Absolutely adorable. The ONLY thing that takes a star away is the zipper... it's tiny! My hand hardly fits, much less trying to pull out a wallet. Other than that... I'll probably order the brown one too :-)

reviews.review_header: It holds all my girlfriend's crayons
reviews.review_text: My girlfriend likes to color with crayons, and this chicken purse holds all ~200 of them with plenty of room for more. I'm concerned about the opening as it's narrow, so over time retrieving crayons may be exhausting, but it's a very nice purse otherwise. She loves that it's a chicken of sorts.

reviews.review_header: Prank gift turned into practical and well themed easter container
reviews.review_text: Water tight oddly enough, great volume and was funny as hell given as a serious gift. Was immediately decided that it can be used at Easter.

reviews.review_header: Poor quality, strong contrast with the picture
reviews.review_text: The picture on website is cute and attractive but the product is with poor quality! Not recommend to buy! Almost the worst one in my Amazon's order history!!!

So, since Amazon didn't like one of my honest and earnest reviews, you will never get another good review from me ever again. BUT, I will however, write this paragraph each time just to waste your time. See, unlike you, I'm doing this in my FREE time. Enjoy pole smokers.

This silly chicken purse gives me a chuckle, and I REALLY REALLY wanted to keep it. Unfortunately, the zippered opening was too small to put my wallet in, let alone my beloved Kindle. Other reviewers had mentioned the opening was small, but I was hopeful that it would work for me. Sadly, my "henbag" had to go back.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: This purse is incredibly unique and very awesome! I would recommend it to anyone who wants something that stands out. Only downside is that when it got shipped, the beak was smashed so it's permanently crooked instead of straight like in the picture.

I Love thing's that are different and when I saw this purse I feel in love. It's super cute in person. It's rubber and has quite a bit of room in it. I bought it for a friend for her birthday and she loves it. I'm going to order another one for myself.

reviews.review_header: Ohhhh how did I live without this for so long?
reviews.review_text: One simply cannot be in a "fowl" mood while carrying a chicken purse. She is made really well. Lovely silky lining on the interior. She will be travelling everywhere I go this spring. So far loving the looks we get while out and about.
The Chicken Hen Tote handbag was perfect. It was just what I was trying to find for my granddaughter. She loved it.
the zipper opening is too small to fit my hand in much less a wallet so I was disappointed in usefulness
I purchased 2 of these, one for myself and one for a friend. While I wouldn't use it as my daily purse, it certainly is a hoot as a joke type purse.

I agree with others, the zipper is short but when you see the design of the purse it makes sense why it is short. I am very pleased with this purchase. The purse is very well made and has nice vivid colors. I gave it as a gift a year ago and it is holding up great. No rips or tears yet.
I saw someone with one of these things and it's so cute, I couldn't resist. I bought another in brown, which I kept, and will give this as a gift to a deserving person!!

reviews.review_header: awesome bag for you chicken lovers
reviews.review_text: I was looking for chicken items for my daughter who is an avid chicken fan and this fit the bill

I purchased two of these as Christmas gifts for friends. A friend of mine bought me one, also! I am pleased by their unique appearance. The only thing I wish was different is that the zippered opening is a bit on the small side. Otherwise, this item is wonderful and I look forward to using it.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: Gave the Rubber Chicken Purse as a gift. Very well received and was fun for everyone there. Seemed well made and was the same texture/material as the classic rubber chicken.

I can not tell you how many comments, ALL GOOD, that I get on my Chicken Pocketbook! People both young and old just love my chicken and they HAVE to touch it! One of the neatest things that I have EVER bought for myself! For SURE do NOT buy this if you do not like any attention!

Bought two, one for me and one as a gift. Thought I could use as a fun lunch box for work. My co-worker, who got the one as a gift, changed the zipper to a longer one, so she could get her sandwich out without it being crushed on the way out ! :)

reviews.review_header: so cute and big and durable
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my daughter for Xmas. I know she will love this. She saw someone with it and everyone stopped her to say how cute it was. She really wanted one too. I am very pleased

The chicken purse is made of vinyl and is not very made for anyone wanting a real purse. This bag is very large and is for some one that wants a bit of whimsy. It is cute and was bought for an elderly person who is crazy about chickens. She LOVED IT!

reviews.review_header: Look at it! IT IS GREAT!
reviews.review_text: Seriously, do I have to say anything about this? Look at it! It is fantastic! No matter where I go with this purse, people can't help but smile. It breaks barriers lol Angry people even get excited. It changes people. lol I know, dramatic review, but honest. I love this bag because it makes people happy! It is so cute! I will they would make a bigger one. This is a pretty normal size, but I like big bags! : )
super cute i can't wait to give it to my friends mom on christmas! it was a bit expensive though i normally wouldn't pay that much for a chicken bag that I probably wouldn't cary with me anyway

I love my chickens...and I really do like the concept of this purse. It is made of rubber, and therefore would be a great purse for rainy weather. When the purse arrived, it had been folded for shipping (I can understand that), However, I have to keep it fairly loaded so it doesn't look like a folded chicken. I love carrying it and always get compliments (or at least giggles), but I have had to quit carrying it since the zipper is so short and it is a constant struggle to get my wallet in and out through the zippered opening. When I do manage to get the wallet through the top it always seems to hang on the pocket inside the purse and I have to struggle to get it past that obstacle too. I am really disappointed that the inconvenience is greater than the pleasure of carrying it since I really do like the bag. I think it would have held up well if I had been able to use it more often. But alas, I guess it was not meant to be! On the plus side, once you are able to fit your items into the bag it holds quite a bit of necessary things that women like to carry around with them. Another plus for this bag is that if you happen to be of child bearing age and also happen to have a small person you are carrying around with you...I'm sure a couple of bottles would fit in here nicely along with a diaper or two. And if a bottle happened to leak...hey, no problem. Rubber chicken will protect liquids from bleeding through and damaging anything the purse happens to be sitting on. You would have to be careful with the diaper suggestion though. I think the zipper would probably tear the plastic around the diaper.

I saw a girl at the gym with this bag and I had to have one. The zipper was really small and I could not easily put anything inside it without intricate, time-consuming maneuvering. It was a conversation starter and the kids loved it. I took it to a farm school and the real chicken there had issues with it and tried to attack it. When I first unpacked it, I was thrown off by the smell, and I hoped that in time, it would diminish. No. It didn't. It's like a dead body was dipped in petroleum and glued to a giant moth ball. The fumes are so intense it makes your nose burn and your contact lenses bend inside out. You will weep for any kind of relief. I filled the entire purse with bounce sheets and wrapped it in wax paper and stuck it in the freezer for a week to see if the smell would fade away. No such luck. All my frozen food smells like it's been shoved up the tail pipe of a big rig. I had to throw everything out. I put baby powder in it and wrapped it in bubble wrap and put it outside for a week and then poured baking soda in the purse to see if that would help. No. It didn't. Although I really loved the concept and whimsy of the purse, I finally gave up the dream and donated it to Goodwill by dumping it in an overnight depository. At this time I must apologize to the needy who will discover this petroleum treasure. I mean you no harm. But it's cute, isn't it?

reviews.review_header: Lucy is busy gathering her fresh eggs.
reviews.review_text: My 4 year old God-daughter is loving having live chickens in her Denver backyard and uses her chicken purse to gather the daily supply of eggs. So Cute!!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I'm a chicken nut, so when I recieved this bsg as an Xmas gift I was thrilled. Carried it for a long time and got a ton of compliments on it. It has held up well, even with extended use.

It's very cute. The opening is too small only if your hands aren't small. My hands are average sized for a woman, and it was difficult to remove my wallet from this purse. I would keep that in mind before ordering it. I wanted to keep it, but my family was embarrassed to be seen with me and this purse. They were mean about it. This is something else you might want to consider before purchasing it. Will your friends or relatives give you hell over a chicken purse? Can you stand their mean jibes?

reviews.review_header: Cute, hilarious, and not made for long term use. A great gag gift.
reviews.review_text: This is a hen bag. It is a great gag gift, but I am sure it will fall apart given a lot of use. Its build quality is not that of a Michael Kors or Tory Burch bag, it is made of thin rubber (or vinyl or something of that ilk) barring the handles, which are rolled canvas. Where these stitch to the rubber is bound to fall apart eventually. That said, it's a hen bag!

reviews.review_header: Love this bag, wish it lasted longer :(
reviews.review_text: I thought this bag was amazing! It was so cute and I got so many compliments on it. It also shipped very quickly and was packed nicely. Though after a few months of carrying it the seam around the bottom started coming apart and then one of the handles actually ripped off :( Very sad because I loved it, but I don't know if I would buy another one knowing it won't last too long. Maybe I just got a defective one, I would still recommend getting it at least once, it was a lot of fun while it lasted.
This is a eye catching fun loving item lots of fun to watch people when they see it some want to take there picture with it. JB
You get exactly what is pictured. The texture is like one of those rubber chickens from a cheesy comedy show. Holds it's shape nice too.

Love this purse. The only downfall about it is the opening to get into it is so small. You can barley get your hand inside it let alone see inside it. You better know what you put in it cause its hard too see inside. Other than that its awesome,

We raise chickens and when I saw an acquaintance with a purse like this, I just had to get my own! This purse is always a conversation starter at the check out or in a restaurant. Actually, almost everywhere I go, someone comments on my "chicken". More times than not, they think she's pretty awesome! We took a recent vacation and I made sure to take pictures of it at certain locations. I ended up naming it "Chicken" instead of "My Purse". It is also very durable and waterproof. The only downside is the opening and the inside, The opening is rather small but the inside is huge. I do a lot of blind searching for things. I have started caring small zip pouches in it to separate my items. It would be better if there were a couple of zip pockets on the sides on the inside. Other than that.. Chicken is pretty cool!
Its a chicken! Its a bag! Whats not to like. Youll get alot of attention wearing this around though, so be prepared to explain your love for poultry
It's not a toy is a purse! Love it! I get a lot of looks, and remarks . My husband just shook his head. Haha!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I love my chicken purse. I get lots of compliments. It is starting to fall apart however, but only after owning it and using it everyday for over a year now. The opening is a bit small as well, but makes one just keep a more organized purse... if you want to find anything in it that is.

I saw this purse being carried by a woman on a plane and had to have it. It is so cute. Get lots of comments. Took it to a quilt show and everyone commented on it. Holds a lot of items. I am thinking about looking for a sound box that will make a clucking noise to use around children.
I like it. It was fun and my wife loved it. good product. I like it. It was fun and my wife loved it. good product.

reviews.review_header: Cute but don't pay that much!!
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a quirky friend. It's hilarious and cute, but no one is seriously paying $300 for this are they? You can get it for $39 elsewhere.

Be prepared to answer "WHERE did you GET that!" a lot. I agree with the other raters that the zipper is too short, and it smells like rubber (for a while, it's fading now) but it is great fun. It is definitely bigger on the inside than it looks. If I were to guess, you could probably fit 5 or 6 water bottles inside (if that were all you were carrying). I am not a chicken collector but a Rubber Chicken makes for great conversations. And at this price, I do a lot of talking. :) I dare you to get one. You too will have a lot of fun. I wore this one out and had to order a new one. People were asking me where it was. Still fun, still worth the sale price and still getting asked about it.
I always get positive comments when I use my chicken purse and am always asked where I found it. Gets attention
Bought this purse for a holiday party white elephant gift. It was a hit! Lots of laughs and lots of trades to try to get the purse.

reviews.review_header: Who Wouldn't Love A Genuine Rubber Chicken Purse??
reviews.review_text: Gave this purse to a friend along with the Clucker Chicken hat. Laughed so hard that it hurt! Also gave her a CD of the chicken dance with chicken slippers. We danced and laughed until we couldn't stand up anymore. She said she wore the ensemble to work and had to sign autographs in the parking lot--of course we both work in mental health hospitals! Fun! Fun! Fun! Perfect fun gift!
I love this bag. The zipper part is not very big so it is difficult to get larger things in but the purse itself is just adorable, so I can over look the zipper detail. Very cute!!!

reviews.review_header: Holy cow! I mean, holy chicken this is cute!
reviews.review_text: I've had this clucker for only a week and have gotten many compliments. It is an attention grabber and I've been asked several times about where I bought it. So glad I didn't chicken out in ordering this!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I used this purse for a pretty long time. The enclosure was very small which was annoying BUT the amount of people that were like WHOA look at your purse... was worth the struggle. :)

Initially this was an impulse buy that I held off on for a few hours after I had seen a co-worker from another unit carrying this proudly on her arm. I kept telling myself I didn't "need" it, but I really, really wanted it! I clicked that one-click order button and never regretted it. Very sturdy bag. Such a sweet piece of arm whimsy. The rubber smell does fade after 3-4 weeks. Would purchase again in a heartbeat. Great service from Amazon as always!
my mom collects roosters and chickens and it was very cute addition to her collection and if she uses it I doubt very highly anyone could steal her purse if she used it
The color is wrong on the pic, the bag is more yellow-orange, and I don't like it. Smells terrible. Hole-zip is really small and it hard put your stuff easily.

I got this along with a baby chick coin purse to give to my mother as a gift. The quality of this purse is so cheap! I can see them selling this same purse for at most $20 and that's giving it a huge mark up for its novelty value. It probably only cost them like two bucks to make it. The material is thin and due to the way it's been packaged for who knows how long, the purse is lumpy. The area around the tail is folded out at an unflattering angle and one side of the face is lower than the other, along with many other lumps and bumps. The purse deflates easily and probably would only look nice if it was kept quite full. However, since the material is so thin my mother is worried that filling it too much will make it break. The plastic rod in the handles also seem like they may come loose and fall out if you're not careful. I can't believe I paid so much for this! At least my mother was amused by the idea of the purse rather than its execution. Thankfully the coin purse I got her made her really happy as it is something she can use for a long time.

What can I say? I got this as a gift and absolutely love it. This is the *ultimate* purse! I had already read other reviews, so I was aware that the zipper compartment was small, so that didn't surprise me. It will take some getting used to, though, so if you're planning on getting this purse, be prepared for a small adjustment period as you get used to carefully guiding things through a small opening. That said, I have a very large wallet, and it fits inside. Think of it as a bonus - nobody is ever just going to reach into your purse and snatch something out. You'll *know* if they try, and they won't be able to do it quickly. Your chicken will protect your goodies. The purse can hold quite a bit. It's a fat little thing with one little side pocket inside. When I used it the other day I put this in it: - a full size wallet - some paperwork - a nail care case - an electronic cigarette case about the size of my full size wallet - lots of pens and pencils - a knife - a sewing kit - a comb and brush - some safety pins - some scissors - a 16 oz. bottle of soda - my cell phone - two small packages of candy - my keys - my medicine - a charging cord for the e-cig - women's personal products - a small credit card pouch - reading glasses in a plastic case - a roll of tape And although the little chicken was full, there was room for more. It's also water-proof, which can be quite handy where I live. The only way you could improve this thing would be to make it cluck when you squeeze the beak.

.I get compliments on this purse daily, and it does hold everything. I wish the zipper opening was larger, but otherwise, I love it. The rubber smell eventually became a non-issue and was much less potent.
I had my eye on this for awhile, so my husband just said get it if you want it! So I did. I love it!

My sister said she wanted a purse for Christmas last year, so I found this and decided to buy it for her!! This thing is made out of rubber so it smells terrible, but it is the funniest thing I've purchased in awhile. My friend and I threw this chicken in a box stuffed with feathers and then we wrapped the hell out of it! My sister's face was priceless when she opened it! Haha!

This is the cutest handbag (or is that hen-bag?) ever! Most of the bag is made of rubber with a corded nylon bottom and very sturdy handles. The zippered area at the top is a little smaller than I would like, but the bag makes up for it with a huge capacity. The bag comes shipped flat. I stuffed mine full of packing material so that it will keep its shape between uses. As a backyard chicken owner, this is so appropriate and would make a great gift for any chicken loving gal.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I am using my Chicken Purse this week. Ive had a few comments on it from others. It has enough room but I wish it was easier to access. The top zipper is kind of small and does not allow you to see everything in your purse. Otherwise, very cute.

Saw this online and immediately knew I had to have one. Am very happy with it. Everywhere I carry it women think it is cute and want to know where I got it. And of course I have to share AMAZON! Thank you for having such unique items.
I bought this bag for my friend and she could not go anywhere without people commenting on it! It was so popular that she changed her texting and calling sounds to a chicken cluck.

I bought this for my 11 year old daughter, who is obsessed with chickens, for her birthday. She was so surprised because she had because she had never seen anything like this. She has gotten many compliments on it. My only small complaint is that the zipper opening is little, so getting things in and out takes a little work. Otherwise this is a great item and I am thinking I might need one for myself!

Very cute purse. You will get some odd looks when carrying this Hen bag. Very fun piece. It smells like rubber to the point I had to air it out and place satchets inside before I could carry it. The opening is very small making it difficult to get things in and out. I also purchased the chick coin purse. Makes a great addition to the mother hen purse.

reviews.review_header: Bawk Bawk Bawk Cute but not very practical.
reviews.review_text: If you or a friend are chicken enthusiasts then this is a fun gift. The purse feels like a rubber chicken which I don't personally love but my friend did. The problem is that the opening on top is too small and makes it difficult to load and unload it. The matching coin purse is cute but has the same problem. I bought an egg key chain to go in the coin purse for my friend and it wouldn't fit in the opening and it is hard to get coins out of it unless you dump it over. I made a box that looked like a chicken nest and put Easter eggs in and around it and gave it to my wonderful boss for Easter. I don't know if she liked it or not. She had seen it in an expensive tourist shop in Savannah, GA and thought it was really fun so I ordered one for her.

My hen bag is actually better than the picture. Detail and shading were impressive for a rubber chicken bag. The smell is a bit off-putting, but fades after a few days. The opening in the top is a bit small, so getting things in or out of the bag takes a bit of doing. I carry this bag everywhere and it never fails to get a laugh, smile or comment from people that notice it. It's a fun, fun bag. Nothing to take to a fancy engagement....or is it?

reviews.review_header: Am I the only one who feels the terrible smell of rubber from this "toy"?
reviews.review_text: Very cheaply made, absolutely unattractive and has a very strong 'toxic' smell of rubber. Would never let a child get close to it.

It's very durable and can fit a lot more than you'd think. I get a lot of compliments and head-turns. My only complaint is that the straps are a little short so it's definitely more of a handbag than anything.

Love this purse, I get so many compliments the opening is a little narrow but there is plenty of room on the inside. And it is easy to wipe down which I love. It is constructed very well too. I just love it, great for chicken addicts like me.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: She was very cute, but extremely stinky rubber and the opening on top is way to small to be used practically.

I love the bag! my son adores it too, when he is upset in the stroller, i just show him the chicken, and make clucking sounds and he starts laughing. has saved much time grocery shopping that way. also receive many compliments. came flat in the mail, but once you start using it, it plumps up.
I ordered this bag for my daughter's birthday and she absolutely loves it! She says every time she carrys it she gets cute comments....
I can't top the review where the chicken travels the country, but this is a cute little novelty bag that I got as a gift for my daughter, it's well made and fun! I should have ordered one for myself.

I use this bag for my small knitting projects. It always brings a laugh. I was going to the doctor for a serious medical issue and it brought a laugh to all of us as I was knitting in the waiting room. The zipper opening is limited so it wouldn't work for my primary purse. I love it for the comedic value.
Cute but the zipper opening is way to small to be able to get anything in or out at all.

I got this because I am obsessed with odd things. What could be more odd than a purse that also functions as a rubber chicken? It looks just like it does in the picture, it seems durable. Just like other reviewers have mentioned, it would be nicer if the zipper was a little longer. I have difficulty squeezing my water bottle through the opening, but inside the actual purse, it is quite spacious. I wish the straps were a bit bigger so I could put it over my shoulder. I guess I have to get used to carrying it on my arm or actually holding the handles. I love this purse and I get a lot of odd looks around campus, but this purse is totally me and everyone else around me seems to love it too!
I BOUGHT THIS AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT AND IT WENT OVER BIG TIME. MY DAUGHTER LOVED IT.SHE USES IT WHEN SHE GOES ANTIQUE SHOPPING.

It's a Rubber Chicken Purse! What's not to love? Every time I take this out with me in public I get Oooo's and Ahhh's from many people asking where I got it. Plus it's big enough to hold a ton of stuff and you can rinse it off in the sink. Sturdy rubber and cloth covered handle for ease of carrying. Rubber isn't stinky either.

I bought the Henbag for my 21 year old sister for Christmas and have been enjoying getting updates on the everyday enjoyment she gets from having such a classy handbag. Best Christmas present ever according to her, so of course a win for me. From her - The bag is rubber, so it is very durable and will clean easily. It is a medium purse size, will fit your everyday items, but it is not a large tote that you can put on your shoulder and take lots of things with. If you want a lot of 2nd looks and comments about how well accessorized you are - this is the purse for you. If you want to go through life obscurely and not be noticed -- this is not the purse for you.

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: This very unique item is fun to carry about. Makes people smile when they see it. Will sorta fold up on itself when put on a flat surface. Larger than I expected, this purse can hold several items and the zipper works well.

I bought this for my mom who loves chickens. I had read previous reviewers' comments and agreed that it needs an egg-shaped coin purse. So I made one for her. Now if we could only add a ring tone of the chicken dance or something .... :) Seriously, though it is super sturdy, not heavy at all. The flat bottom is nice and the light colored interior helps to locate items inside. The only change I'd made is for the opening to be a few inches wider, but that's because I like big slouchy bags and the big openings that come with them. But the purse wasn't for me anyhow. I have been advised that Mom gets chatted up quite a bit whenever she takes her chicken purse with her. LOVE IT!!!
I just recieved this purse. Love it. The zipper is a little short but I can get my wallet, kindle and all kinds of stuff in it. Lots of room and not heavy to carry at all. It is really a cute bag!
It is adorable! I love it! It is easy to find items in the purse because of the light-colored interior lining. I purchased the "chicken coin purse" as well. So cute!

Saw someone at a knitting guild meeting with one-had to get one for myself and daughter in law who raises chickens. Love the coloring-because of the rubbery material it holds it's shape when placed on a table-adorable It is lined with a yellow fabric -same on outside bottom-not that durable looking-my only complaint We both love our hen bags!
Exactly what I expected. Easy ordering and it arrived on time. Couldn't be more pleased with the overall experience. My friend will love it!!

reviews.review_header: people gather like a clutch of hens around my purse
reviews.review_text: Love it...BUT....it stinks. I read the reviews and thought "okay, it stinks, it should fade away and all will be good". It has the oddest smell--one of construction worker with no deodrant in 105 degree heat with a side of fried onions. In fact, when my daughter opened the box and we were passing "Mrs. Henny Penny" around, she mentioned that it smelled like Burger King. I crammed newspaper (supposed to absorb odors) and a scented dryer sheet. Let it sit for a few days and it seems to be tolerable. I don't carry it next to my nose so I no longer care about the smell...although I question if other can smell it as a I walk by because, Lordy, I hope they don't think that is me stinking like that LOL! :-D The perfect gift for a lover of all things chicken :-D
IS DARLING AN I LOVE IT. ONLY ONE THING I'M NOTCRAZY ABOUT. THE OPENING (ZIPPER) IS SO SMALL. MY WALLET HARDLY FITS INTO IT. OTHERWISE, I'S GREAT AND VERY FUN. THANX.

I collect anything chicken so this is right up my alley. I got alot of compliments on it. You can wipe it clean with a damp cloth easily. The only problem that I have with it is the opening is to small. I had to put a bigger zipper in it to be able to get my wallet and gun in easily.
I named my purse Henry and all my friends, family and coworkers know him by name. He is the most famous purse in my town

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I love my rubber chicken purse so much! It was a Christmas gift from my husband (it had been on my wishlist), I've been using it ever since. It never ceases in making me smile. Definitely a conversation starter...you'll definitely be noticed, for better or worse. :D Comes clean pretty easily. My only issue with it is I wish the inside pocket was deeper. Other than that I absolutely love it!

I love the look of it . Everyone conpliments I must ware my things out because after a month or so The rubber under the handles started to tear Have no clue where to get that fixed . Totally thought rubber was more durable . I was wrong and naive . I cant return it? Someone told me to take it to a Purse company see if they could fix it. I doubt There are many professional places that would Fix rubber purses lookin like chickens . If anyone knows of any give me a reply thank you .

This purse is too funny, and it certainly attracts attention. Right after it arrived, it went with me to the county fair, and I lost count of how many people commented on it. The bag is well made and has lots of room inside. Because it is rubber, it can be a little uncomfortable to carry on a hot day. This item was very well packaged and arrived in perfect condition.

I love my chicken purse, but the smell is so horrible. I'm not sure how long it will last, but I have stopped using it for now as everywhere I go I smell like some nasty mix of body odor and a tire! The purse is adorable though and the 4 times I went out with it I got comments every single time, everyone loves it!
Purchsed this for my niece that is trying her hand at raising chickens for the first time! She LOVED it!!! Great big hit. ALOTA laughs!!

Got this silly thing for my wife as a joke, she keeps hens and loves all things poultry. She takes it everywhere with her now and gets comments all the time. Only problem was at first the smell of rubber was strong, but that faded over a couple of days. Fun item and worth the money.
This is the perfect HEN Gift, my hen girlfriends love it, I plan to buy each one for their BDay

I got this purse from a friend for my birthday. We had seen one about a year early and loved the idea of it. However, I have only had it about a month. The tag has already fallen off it somewhere so I can't open and close the purse. The zipper is so small it is difficult to carry almost anything in it or to even try and find what you have in it is almost impossible.

Love getting comments and smiles whenever I go out with this bag. I confirm that the opening is too narrow for the holding capacity of the bag, but you can't let it get too heavy. The handles are attached directly to the rubber chicken form part and you don't want that rubber to rip. It is adequately strong for a wallet and necessities, though.

reviews.review_header: My daughter adores her rubber chicken purse
reviews.review_text: Got this for my 8 year old for Christmas and she is so proud of her Chicken Purse. It's really big and fits her all her goodies that she likes to take around. Yesterday I found a pair of flip flops in it. The opening is small as described but it's not too bad (the flip flops fit!) Love that it's plastic so it can't get damaged or stained as she plays outside, at the ballpark, pool, etc....

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: Please come out with a vegetarian version. Think about what it would be like if a dinosaur or a shark carried a purse that looked like you? Wouldn't that make you feel "less than"? Give the chickens a break; it's not enough that we slaughter them by the millions every day, reducing their beautiful bodies into "nuggets." A "henbag"? Really? Perhaps you're too "chicken" to weave your purses out of hemp, or fashion a "rubber tofurkey" handbag.
so people might look at me weird, but it looks so cute in the shopping cart. Holds everything I need for a supermarket run

I love this purse. I bought it so I could tote my yarn and knitting around. It is large and roomy. When something is inside of it and you set it down it puffs up and you get a large fat chicken sitting next to you. It is very well made, high quality. The inside is lined. The handles are really secure.
This is for my sister hen party and i couldn't find it anywhere, its awesome. Its just what i wanted!

reviews.review_header: Cute as a bug (or should I say hen?)
reviews.review_text: What a hoot this purse is, and yes, I agree with several other reviewers that the zipper part is not terribly long, but hey - it's a chicken purse - not something you would carry everyday! :) Our daughter has three fat hens, and she will love the purse!
Having lots of fun carrying this Hen-bag yet the opening at the top is small, hard to access the interior, see whats inside , removing or putting items in is a struggle
love it ...have had a lot of laughs with it and the only thing i wish the zipper in the opening was bigger but love it just the same
This purse has been a conversation piece everywhere we go....I also found a chick change purse here on amazon that is a perfect match for this purse... funny stuff.

Love this henbag! It is as the image showed on amazon.com. The henbag is quite spacious and can fit in a lot of things even though the opening is not as wide as I would hope for. It's a birthday gift for my mother-in-law! Her Chinese horoscope is a CHICKEN.

Bought this as a gift for my sister who had seen it in a catalog. Naturally I check Amazon where the prices are consistenly better and got it for her. She gets tons of compliments on it. Only complaint is the zipper is slightly short and hard to get a regular size wallet out of it. Other than that ii is super sturdy!

name: Rubber Chicken Purse - The "Hen Bag" Handbag

reviews.review_text: I got this bag as a birthday present from a friend of mine. At first I wasn't sure where I was going to use it, but I ended up taking it to a concert in New York where it certainly attracted a lot of attention!

I saw this chicken purse on someone else's blog and I HAD to have it! I am actually a poultry owner, but I think this is such a fun purse even for the non-chicken owner! This purse is really well made. The rubber is thick, and it has a liner with a pocket inside. This is a much bigger purse than I was expecting. I'm not sure what I was expecting, actually, but you can really fit a LOT in this purse. I have gotten giggles and lots of great compliments on this purse. Everyone asks me where I got it and asks to touch it to see if it is REALLY rubber. (yes, it is) A very fun conversation piece, I have worn it everywhere from church, a girls night out, to just every day shopping. I'm surprised how many people love it, because I just got it for myself! The handles are a nylon webbing with a plastic form in them to hold their shape. They are really comfortable and I have no issues with the handles. I've had this purse about a month now and it's held up really well, especially since I've been using it every day since I got it. The great thing is, if it gets dirty, it would be easy to wipe down. ;)

It is just TOO cute!! I saw it in specialty catalogs for a much higher cost. I am thrilled with this bag. I can even carry make up, my lunch and stuff for the gym without worry. It is made of durable, easily cleanable material
This bag is perfect for me. I need a waterproof bag for necessary supplies. Also it is so cute, i love the chicken

I've had my Henbag for over two years and I get compliments every time I carry it. Since it's a rubber chicken I always use it when it's raining. She keeps everything dry. I've ordered six of them over the years for friends who have admired it or if they happen to have chickens. I've even sent three of them to London for a friend that gives them as presents. A real conversation piece!

Purse arrived in good time, packed well, no problems. I stuffed it with plastic bags for a few days to press out a wrinkle, worked fine. Have had lots of fun with Scarlett Wattles :) Even made her a page on Facebook! Thanks for the smiles.

reviews.review_header: I am buying my third hen bag.
reviews.review_text: This is true... I have literally worn out two other hen bags and decided that I need a new one. I switched to a black satchel and it is SO BORING. People love the hen bag all around the world. I took it to London, France, and Spain...everywhere I went, people were thrilled. It really is a conversation starter and broke down cultural barriers like no amount of well-meaning language butchering could. Anywhere I go, whether it's starbucks or a dive bar, people love the chicken. I decided that since everyone was going to be so nice about it, I would get little gifts to hand out to people who found it amusing, which is why I got the Mini Chickens: [...] They sell them by the gross, and I did not foresee getting through a gross of itty bitty chickens, but people love them. Kids, adults, men, women... everyone loves them. I receive photos from all measure of situations and geographies featuring my chickens having margaritas, sunning themselves, supporting mini gnomes, etc. I think of this bag as a lifestyle. There is one seriously bad thing about this bag, which is the zipper at the top. It's so fricken small. It takes a lot of work to get anything at all out of the top. Digging for makeup is practically impossible. It's just an unfortunate function of the physiology of the rubber chicken style, but it still is a pain in the butt. However, at $22, you can not get a better life improvement tool. I truly believe that. Combine it with a taco coin purse, since I hear the matching rubber chicken coin purse sucks.
x was wanting a COACH for her b-day. i thought about if for a few days and went to look up fake handbags this is what google gave me.. so i bought it. put it in a COACH bag and gave it to her..

Great novelty gift item for those chicken lovers, thick rubber purse with very small zippered opening. I have small hands and I barely could squeeze my hand in, but it was purchased more as a gag gift

This Chicken Purse or "Henbag" is just adorable! This is a must for any "Chick" that loves chickens! It is a real conversation piece and just fun to use. I would highly recommend this for anyone who has a good sense of humor and likes to have fun! Rubber Chicken Hen Tote Bag Handbag Purse Pocketbook "Henbag"

name: Set Of Ten Finger Hands Finger Puppets

reviews.review_text: I can't even explain why these are so funny, but they are!
This is best thing I have ever bought. My life is so much better now. They say money can’t buy happiness but these hands are my happiness

reviews.review_header: Complete set but has 2 dark colors.
reviews.review_text: These tiny hands are great. They're soft and fits well but bigger than I expected. I've seen reviews getting incomplete or mismatching pairs. I got a set of 10 hands -- 5 left and 5 right, which is great. Only problem is one pair is the dark version. It's not bad because it's still a correct pair but kind of dissapointing because I want them to have the same color. The plastic packaging is sealed so I'm guessing these hands are packaged in bulk through a conveyor or something and the pieces are not well sorted as they go through and fall into the plastic. If not, well, there's a messed up process (human error) that keeps happening while these are sorted which is a bummer.
Cute. My daughter has been having fun with these
My daughter has had a blast creeping people out with these little hands.
I purchased these as a gift and they did not disappoint.
as advertised
Hands are roughly the size of Donald Trump's, for comparison.
8 light skin tone and 2 dark skin tone - are you KIDDING ME? No mention of mixed skin tones in product description and photo shows matching hands HOW HARD IS IT TO SORT THE HANDS BY COLOR EPIC FAIL

reviews.review_header: Friends and strangers love them, as do I
reviews.review_text: I had wanted these for a long time and I definitely don't regret finally buying them. I carry a pair with me just about everywhere I go. Friends and strangers love them, as do I

name: Set Of Ten Finger Hands Finger Puppets

reviews.review_header: Handy hand puppets for office fun.
reviews.review_text: I bought two sets of these for a coworker after showing him Llamas with Hats (its on youtube, NSFW, you've been warned) and he loved them. Then he started giving them to coworkers because they like them too. I work in a professional office environment and the president of the company now has a pair of them sitting on his desk. This has to be the best office gift that keeps on giving. I just got another email from a coworker asking for more. Bonus - The guy I originally bought them for is our resident carpenter/facilities guy or handy man for short.
I don't know what I expected

reviews.review_header: So funny, bought these as a gag gift for my ...
reviews.review_text: So funny, bought these as a gag gift for my sister. She loved them, wish they came in a darker skin tone.
they are so ridiculous and i love it. wore them around the office and was entertained by the reactions
These have provided my kids with tons of entertainment. Making funny videos and little jokes with these is hilarious!
Great gag gift. So much fun to surprise people with
These are great, though I should note that one of my two orders included only nine hands, not ten

The hand finger puppets where exactly what I wanted. I bought them so that my infant child could hold a hand his size, while still holding my hand (I didn’t want to deprive him of an authentic hand holding experience). It has been so helpful for him, he’s is actually 17 years old now and still loves holding the mini hands. I would have to say that this product has changed his life, because although he doesn’t have many friends, he always has five hands to hold.
Wonderful product!!
These hands were very life-like, although smaller, which was what I was looking for. Product was as described.

name: Set Of Ten Finger Hands Finger Puppets

reviews.review_header: This was probably the most genius purchase I have ever ...
reviews.review_text: This was probably the most genius purchase I have ever made. It was delivered on time as well. If you think you don’t need these, you’re incorrect.
Great to freak out your friends with small hand phobias. Livens up any party. Time to get handsy!!
Why did I buy these? probably fit better on a small female hand

reviews.review_header: A guide to lending people a hand
reviews.review_text: Bring them to a party. Bring them to the bars. Everyone will gravitate towards your tiny hands. Girlfriend needs help cleaning the kitchen? Lend her a hand. Just watched the best movie of your life? Hands down. Love thrift stores? Me too, I love second hand stores. All jokes aside, these are funny as hell and won't disappoint you.
best purchase ever
what you see is what you get! LOVE IT.

reviews.review_header: These are the cutest little things, but of the ...
reviews.review_text: These are the cutest little things, but of the ten eight were right handed and only two left. Of the right hands six were pink and two brown! Such a shame not to take the time and care to get it right.
You will get an uneven number of left and right-handed finger puppets. I received 9 left-handed puppets and 1 single right-handed puppet.
Creepy and awesome

Great quality, but came with 2 different color hands. It’s ok for my purposes, but just in case you want consist color hands, it may not come with that. I ordered the same item about 1 week before and the hands were all the same colors.

name: Set Of Ten Finger Hands Finger Puppets

reviews.review_text: Creepy and funny to use. Perfect finger fit.
Perfect

reviews.review_header: Fail. I was looking forward to getting 5 sets ...
reviews.review_text: Fail. I was looking forward to getting 5 sets of left and right hands, but got 1 right and 9 left hands. Should've said in description that it was a random assortment. Can't even return or replace the product

I love these finger hands so much. Weather you are using them to do ten things at once or to have funny and creepy snapchat stories they are a wholesome purchase and are a great find. I also love my mini feet that I bought along with it and suggest you buy them to enrich your experience.
Fanasuc product! Bought this as a birthday gift for my best friend and she LOVED it. Makes for a great gift for people with a good sense of humour. It came 5 left and 5 right hands
Great product.
*Goes up to random person* "I don't mean to ask for much, just a little high-five."
How fun are these?! THey turn any ordinary task into a fun and funny experience.
These are very strange and a perfect gift for strange people.
Loved my tiny hands! I can give myself so many high fives!
