Beware - Elevated Liver Enzymes I'm a 35-yr old woman and tried this supplement to possibly get a little more length to my hair. I didn't think much about it and read great reviews of results so figured why not! I went to my primary for routine annual bloodwork and he called saying my liver enzymes were extremely elevated. I am otherwise very healthy and athletic, drink little alcohol. The only thing that had changed was taking this supplement! He said to stop taking it and we will repeat the bloodwork in a few months. Low and behold, my levels were back to normal! So just a word of caution to all you women who want super long hair without extensions (like me!) and think it's harmless to try this - think again! Nothing is worth potential permanent damage to your liver!!!!! After researching, I think it could be the Niacin but am not certain. Regardless, if you are taking this, please at least get bloodwork done to ensure your levels are where they need to be. xoxo

Even my eyebrows are thicker and lashes too. Great outcome but you have to be diligent and it will take at least 2 months for you to start seeing results. The first month you will notice a lot less hair fall. By month 2 and 3 you will see hair regrowth.

So I thought I would try and again I live life with a lot of stress and have had hair loss in past from it. Since staying on this product I have not. I now get it monthy delivered through Amazon so I do not forget to buy. I highly recommend the try. I believe any product like this there is a time period you do need to stay on before knowing. reviews.review_header: SO FAR SO GOOD 3 month update
reviews.review_text: Began taking this May 1st. It's too soon to tell if my hair is growing yet, but my nails could be used as a screw driver if I couldn't find a real one! Plus they're growing a fast as the grass in the lawn. After years of putting on nail extensions on finicky nails this is great! Hopefully the thinning hair will follow soon. I'll update in another month. I promised an update... WOW!!! After the 1st month (May) I could put my hair up in a French twist or pony tail, a little skimpy, but by now, the end of June it's decidedly better. Shine and thicker texture have also returned. Good bye Rogaine hello Viviscal, my new best friend. Oh yes, my nails are still growing like weeds ... no complaint there! And to think I was once thinking of getting a wig :-). Try it, you'll love it! No aside effects, only praise after taking for just beginning the 3rd month. 4 months now, (Sept 4) . Nails still growing like crazy, my French twist or pony tail is looking better. Think this is because the texture has changed. I read that you shouldn't take longer than 6 months so I'll finish up what I have in 2 weeks, and just take Biotin and prenatal vitamins which have been recommended.
Great product and it works. My hair is fuller now than it has been in years. Thanks!

reviews.review_header: These vitamins are the best supplements I've ever purchased for my hair
reviews.review_text: These vitamins are the best supplements I've ever purchased for my hair! I did my research before making the decision to try these and they did not disappoint. I was looking for a supplement that had a proven clinical/scientific study, not a fly by night, to good to be true hair vitamin. My hair grows at a pretty good rate as it is, so I can't say much about this supplement for growth, Some years back, my hair has lost major density after my Dr had me on alot of antibiotics for a condition that resulted in me having to have a hysterectomy. Nothing I did helped thicken it. My hair was so thin, I didn't like wearing it straight ( I'm African American)because you could see through it. Now, My hair is so thick that it takes upwards of an entire day to wash, condition, detangle and style it..and my hair is short! ( I clipper cut all my hair off 10/2016). My hair is now over 4" all over which averages to over 1/2" a month. If you're looking for a gimmicky product to grow your hair fast, This isn't it, but if you're looking for something to help you grow thick, healthy hair along with good eating habits, You've found the holy grail. Give it 3 months before making a sound decision on whether this is the product for you. You need to also take into consideration that If you have genetically thin hair, this product will not create thick hair. This product helps wake up dead hair follicles that previously had hair growing within it. I've been using this product since February and it's the best thing since sliced bread.
I don't notice as much thinning when taking these.

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product that really works but it does take time. I started using this product and was purchasing it from Rite Aid and then realized Amazon had it as well so it is a subscription for me. I was taking two a day for a little bit but found that one a day works well for maintenance and it has helped my hair A LOT! I dyed my hair and did that for a number of years and as I got older the hair just stopped growing and starting breaking way too easily and I found I could not grow my hair at all! I found this product and I had tried a number of them over the years with few lasting results. I was desperate for something and so stuck with this and I can say, though it does take at least 3 months or maybe more to really start seeing the results-----------the results were like night and day for me! I LOVE my hair again. I highly recommend you try this but keep in mind it does take time. It is well worth the price and the effort.

I've been battling Colon Cancer for the last several years-Cancer, chemo, age, and medicines that I had been placed on made my once envied hair dull, thinning, and looking sad. I came across an article (Maybe in Vogue?) where the writer tried them with great results, and thought "why not? Can't get any worse..." I am soooo thankful that I did, because they have made a major difference for me. Enough of a difference that I have had people remark about it. I can also see about several inches of new growth around my hairline as well as it has helped my nails. I do have to get my brows tweezed more frequently, because it makes ALL hair grow-But that is a pittance to pay in comparison to regaining your self esteem...I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT....

So, now I have a button to press when they annoy me during family get together, namely the holidays. So why four stars? It isn't loud enough. I'd say it's barely 60 decibels and that is your ear very close to it. 60 decibels is REGULAR speech volume, but my family is not regular. More like 90 decibels and more than that if they try to out talk each other which is a frequent occurrence, especially during the holidays. So, unless we have a moment of silence, it is hard to hear this thing. It would be perfect if it had another 25 decibels. I'd give it 3.5 stars, dropped down only because of volume.

If you buy this, prepare to return it or do maintenance or return it. Upon receipt, BS button would not work. I removed the screw to gain access to the batteries. Here I found two JUNK quality batteries which were dead and had leaked electrolyte in the battery compartment as well as corroded battery contacts. I cleaned up the Alkaline using white vinegar and swabs and burnished the corroded contacts. I put in two Duracell AAA batteries and replaced the cover and screw. All is now fine. However as not everyone is a technician, of course you will have to return the unit. At this price and my time, it was better to fix it. I say to the Manufacturer, "Clean Up Your Act and get a quality battery"!!! This is the second of these I have bought and the first was fine however, the batteries had a very short life. Now, I know why.
